```{python}
#|echo: false
plots=['PlotnineAnimation.ipynb#spiral',
       'geom_col.ipynb#two_variable_bar_plot',
       'geom_density.ipynb#density_curve',
       'geom_map.ipynb#map',
       'geom_segment.ipynb#ranges',
       'geom_segment.ipynb#rank']

def create_gallery(ids, outfile='_gallery.qmd'):
    gallery = ""
    for id in ids:
        gallery += '\n::: {.g-col-6 .g-col-md-4}\n'
        gallery += f"{{{{< embed {id} >}}}}"
        gallery += '\n:::\n'
    with open(outfile, 'w') as f:
        f.write("---\n---\n\n::: {.content-block .grid .gap-4}\n\n")
        f.write(gallery)
        f.write("\n\n:::\n")

create_gallery(plots)
```
